remarks: The ratio of a negative numerator and a positive denominator is negative.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
divlt0gt0d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
divlt0gt0d.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR+ ) $.
divlt0gt0d.3 $e |- ( ph -> A < 0 ) $.
divlt0gt0d $p |- ( ph -> ( A / B ) < 0 ) $.
